name: GitHub Actions: Secrets Scan (TruffleHog)
description: Scan repository for secrets using TruffleHog.

files.template:
name: Secrets Scan

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  trufflehog:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0
      - uses: trufflesecurity/trufflehog@v3.82.8
        with:
          path: .
          base: main
          head: HEAD
          extra_args: --fail
